IMHO le Comte de Mondego is the perfect role for Guy Pearce. Being a bad guy with great swordsmanship skills really fit his on-screen personality and acting style. Great work also from Jim Caviezel in the title role. And may I also add my great appreciation for Richard Harris. I'm a big fan and I miss seeing you act. Thanks for this one, YIFY team. Keep them coming guys.
